title: One-shot sniper rifles are returning to Warzone this week
description: Players broadly seem to be in favor of the Season 3 tweak, but are concerned about movement speed.

title: Speedrunners are already making a mockery of Resident Evil 4's hardest difficulty

title: Riot will let you pay to turn your Valorant guns into Counter-Strike guns
description: The Black Market bundle pays homage to Valorant's fiercest competitor.

description: The new daily puzzle game uses numbers instead of letters, but the color scheme will look plenty familiar to Wordle players.

title: QuakeCon will return in-person for 2023, but with some big changes

title: In 2021 a YouTuber offered $10K to whoever could make a Breath of the Wild multiplayer mod, and now you can play it
description: The Breath of the Wild multiplayer mod turns Nintendo's open world masterpiece into a 32-player free-for-all.

title: Dead by Daylight kills its new healing system after blowback from players
description: The multiplayer horror phenomenon has reverted to the original healing system.
